text: hey guys, if anyone is interested in learning Java to try programming or just for fun, this is a really good tutorial to do <https://www.codecademy.com/learn/learn-java>. There is also this second course that I found that I haven't done myself yet, but it seems like a really good one if you want to work more on your Java skills and applying them  in real world situations <https://www.udemy.com/course/practice-java-by-building-projects/>
